programme.title: Men's 3m Springboard Final - Diving | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 03/08/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre, Tokyo. Xie (CHN) claimed the Gold, Wang (CHN) Silver and Laugher (GBR) completed the podium.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 2 - Swimming | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 26/07/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre,Tokyo. It includes the Women's Women's 100m Butterfly Finals, the Men's 100m Breaststroke Finals, the Men's 4x100 Freestyle Relay Final, the Women's 400m Freestyle Finals and their Victory Ceremonies as well as the Semifinals of the Men's 200m, the Men's and Women's 100m Backstronke and the Women's 100m Breaststroke. Macneil (CAN) claimed the Gold in the Women's 100m Butterfly, Peaty (GBR) in the Men's 100m Breaststroke, Titmus (AUS) in the Women's 400m Freestyle and the USA in the Men's 4x100m Freestyle Relay

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 3 - Swimming | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 27/07/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre,Tokyo. It includes the Men's 200m Freestyle Final, the Women's and Men's 100m Backstroke Finals, the Women's 100m Breaststroke Finals and their Victory Ceremonies as well as the Women's 200m Freestyle, the Men's 200m Butterfly and the Women's 200m Individual Medley Semifinals. Dean (GBR) claimed the Gold in the Men's 200m Freestyle, McKeown in the Women's 100m Backstroke, Rylov (ROC) in the Men's 100m Backstroke and Jacoby (USA) in the Women;s 100m Breaststroke.

programme.title: Tom Daley: 1.6 Seconds | Documentary
programme.desc: This feature documentary dives into the life of the UK’s diving legend. From Beijing 2008 to his gold medal in Tokyo 2020 and final Olympics in Paris 2024, Daley shares his personal journey, the pressures, losses, and triumphs that defined his career. Exclusive footage and candid moments reveal a story of resilience and growth.

programme.title: Women's 10m Platform Semi-Final - Diving | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 05/08/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre, Tokyo.

programme.title: Women's 10m Platform Final - Diving | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 05/08/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre, Tokyo. Quan (CHN) claimed the Gold, Chen (CHN) Silver and Wu (AUS) completed the podium

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 6 - Swimming | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre,Tokyo. It includes the Men's 200m Backstroke, the Women's 100m Freestyle, Women's 200m Breaststroke, the Men's 200m Individual Medley Finals and their Victory Ceremonies as well as the Men's 100m Butterfly and Women's 200m Backstroke Semifinals. Schoenmaker (RSA) claimed Gold in the Women's 200m Breaststroke, Rylov (ROC) in the Men's 200m Backstroke, McKeon (AUS) in the Women's 100m Freestyle and Wang (CHN) in the Men's 200m Individual Medley.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 7 - Swimming | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 31/07/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre, Tokyo. It includes the Men's 100m Butterfly, the Women's 200m Backstroke, the Women's 800m Freestyle, the Mixed 4 x 100m Medley Relay Finals and their Victory Ceremonies as well as the Men's and Women's 50m Freestyle Semifinals. Dressel (USA) claimed Gold in the Men's 100m Butterfly, McKeown (AUS) in the Women's 200m Backstroke, Ledecky (USA) in the Women's 800m Freestyle and Great Britain in the Mixed 4 x 100m Medley Relay.

programme.title: Women's 4x200m Freestyle Relay Final | Rio 2016 | Great Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Follow the greatest Olympic Moments from the Rio Summer Olympic Games in 2016 and watch as the USA wins gold in the women's 4x200m freestyle relay final. Australia wins silver and Canada claims bronze

programme.title: Melissa Wu, the Australian Olympic Diver Who Does Not Give Up | Splash In
programme.desc: At the age of 10 she knew that diving was the sport for her. Throughout her 16 years career, diving helped her overcome depression, anxiety, and lack of self-belief, until she won bronze in Tokyo 2020. Watch her story. Soundtrack: Bree Runway, Pressure.

programme.title: Molly Carlson, Canada’s Brave High Diver | Splash In
programme.desc: She started as a gymnast, then switched to diving, before specializing in high diving (20m) because that is what bravery is to her. Along the journey, she learned how to deal with mental health struggles, an experience that she now shares with her fans as a mental health advocate and founder of the #bravegang. Soundtrack: Bastille, Shut Off The Lights

programme.title: Sarah Sjostrom, Sweden’s Swimming Superstar | Splash In
programme.desc: When Sarah slipped and broke her elbow a few months before Tokyo 2020, her fans thought she may not even compete at the Olympics. She fought back, accelerated the recovery, and ended up winning silver in the 50 free. She currently holds 5 World Records and is eyeing Paris 2024 to add new achievements. Soundtrack: Mabel, Let Them Know

programme.title: Izzy Thorpe and Kate Shortman, Team GB’s Promising Artistic Swimmers | Splash In
programme.desc: Their mothers competed together years ago, now Izzy and Kate are following in their footsteps. The two best friends are fully in synch in and out of the pool. Tokyo 2020 was their Olympic debut, and they are both looking forward to making a splash at Paris 2024. Soundtrack: Sigrid, Don’t Kill My Vibe

programme.title: Anatomy of a weightlifter and a swimmer
programme.desc: Ukraine's star Olympian weightlifter and gold medal winning Team USA swimmer reveal remarkable body strength.

programme.title: Women's Diving 10m Platform Final | Barcelona 1992 | Great Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Relive the greatest Olympic Moments from the Barcelona Summer Olympic Games in 1992 and watch as Fu Mingxia wins gold for China in the women's diving 10m platform final. Elena Miroshina wins silver for the Unified Team and Mary Ellen Clark claims bronze for the USA

From Beijing 2008 to his gold medal in Tokyo 2020 and final Olympics in Paris 2024, Daley shares his personal journey, the pressures, losses, and triumphs that defined his career. Exclusive footage and candid moments reveal a story of resilience and growth.

programme.desc: This event took place on 04/08/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre, Tokyo. Kolesnichenko/ Romashina (ROC) claimed the Gold, Huang/Sun (CHN) Silver and Fiedian/Savchuk (UKR) completed the podium

programme.title: Women's 3m Springboard Final - Diving | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 01/08/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre, Tokyo. SHI Tingmao (CHN) won Gold, WANG Han (CHN) Silver and Krysta Palmer took the Bronze medal.

programme.title: Women's 4x200m Freestyle Relay Final | London 2012 | Great Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Relive the greatest Olympic Moments from the London Summer Olympic Games in 2012 and watch as the USA wins gold in the women's 4x200m freestyle relay final. Australia wins silver and France claims bronze

programme.title: The Olympics On The Record | Episode 4
programme.desc: Devers and Ottey's photo finish, a pole vault gamble, the queens of softball are overthrown, Johnson's historic 200m, and The Dream Team.

programme.title: Road to Glory - Athletics - The Middle Distance
programme.desc: The stories behind the key moments in middle distance running at the Olympic Games, including stars like Paavo Nurmi and Maria Mutola.

programme.title: Women's Individual QFs/SFs/Finals - Archery | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at Yumenoshima Park Archery Field, Tokyo. An San (KOR) won Gold, Elena Osipova (ROC) took Silver and Lucilla Boari (ITA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's Kayak (K1) Semi-Final & Final - Canoe Slalom | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Kasai Canoe Slalom Centre, Tokyo. It Includes the Kayak (K1) Men Finals and Victory Ceremony. Prskavec (CZE) claimed the Gold, Grigar (SVK) took the Silver and Aigner (GER) completed the podium.

programme.title: Racing Semi-Finals & Finals - Cycling BMX | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Ariake Urban Sports Park and includes the Women's and Men's Semifinals, Finals and their Victory Ceremonies. In the Women's final, Bethany Shriever (GBR) won Gold, Mariana Pajón (COL) Silver, and Merel Smulders (NED) Bronze. In the Men's final, Niek Kimmann (NED) took the Gold medal, Kye Whyte (GBR) Silver and Carlos Alberto Ramírez Yepes completed the podium.

programme.title: Elaine Thompson-Hera: One sprint to rule them all | Wait For It Tokyo 2020
programme.desc: How Elaine Thompson-Hera became the undisputed sprinting queen and the first woman to win the 100-200m double gold at consecutive Olympics.

programme.title: Neeraj Chopra: Throws his way into a nation's heart | Wait For It Tokyo 2020
programme.desc: Neeraj Chopra makes Olympic history with the first-ever Olympic gold medal in track-and-field for India.

programme.title: Ariarne Titmus: Splashing into swimming royalty | Wait For It Tokyo 2020
programme.desc: How Ariarne Titmus went from chasing gold to being the one to beat after nail bitter 200m and 400m freestyle victories in Tokyo2020

programme.title: Carissa Moore: Carrying surfers' aloha spirit to the top of the podium | Wait For It Tokyo 2020
programme.desc: How native Hawaiian Carissa Moore, honoured generations of surfers by winning the sport's first Olympic gold medal.

programme.title: The Tech Race | Episode 3
programme.desc: In this episode: hockey tracking systems, tennis gliding shoes, ski helmets for the partially blind, archery technology, and hi-speed cameras for training.

programme.desc: The stories behind the key moments in middle distance running at the Olympic Games, including stars like Paavo Nurmi and Maria Mutola.

programme.title: Mat 1: Women's +78kg, Men's +100kg Repechages/Semi-Finals/Finals - Judo | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Nippon Budokan, Tokyo. Sone (JPN) claimed the Gold in the Women's +78kg and KRPALEK (CZE) in the Men's +100kg.

programme.title: Single Sculls, Eights - Rowing | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Sea Forest Waterway, Tokyo. It includes the Men's and Women's Single Sculls Finals as well as the Men's and Women's Eight Finals and their Victory Ceremonies.

programme.title: Women's Qualification & Final - Trampoline Gymnastics | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Ariake Gymnastics Centre, Tokyo. ZHU Xueying (CHN) won Gold, LIU Lingling (CHN) took Silver and PAGE Bryony (GBR) completed the podium.
